resources.string: Flexibility means that customers receive full refund in case of cancellation no later than 2 hours before booked time. Moderate means that customers get full refund if canceled no later than 1 day before booked time . Strictly means that customers get full refund if canceled no later than 2 days before booked time.
Instant booking means that customers can book you directly within your availability period without their booking request being reviewed and approved by you first.

Creators desire solutions is one of the top system integrator partners offering an entire range of IT integrated products and services. Incorporated in the year 2017 and has emerged as one of the fastest growing IT Infrastructure Solution provider supporting customers from small and medium businesses to blue chip clients and also providing a specialist service for the educational institute. CDS has extensive experience in delivering high-quality IT services for all kinds of verticals and technology environments. Driven by a customer oriented approach with focus on absolute standards of operational excellence, each experience has made us develop more innovative solutions provider, and has enabled us to understand business, technology and operational elements in great detail. We want to empower our customers to be able to reach their goals easily and live a more fulfilling and productive life. .
